foods.name: Flatburger
foods.description: Our signature Flatburger which is a super delicious cheeseburger that'll leave you wanting another Flatburger! It's too good to be true!

foods.name: Maple Bacon Burger
foods.description: A great option for a breakfast burger or a great option for brunch if you're hungry enough to eat 2 of these burgers!

foods.name: Mushroom Burger
foods.description: A mushroom burger with our exclusive Flatburger melted cheese!

foods.name: Avocado Bun Burger
foods.description: A healthier take on our signature Flatburger but with avocado buns!

foods.name: Ramen Burger
foods.description: If you love ramen and burgers, what are you waiting for? Order our exclusive ramen burger now!

foods.name: French Fries
foods.description: The good old french fries made in Flatburger style!

foods.name: Burrito
foods.description: A Flatburger style burrito with our exclusive Flatburger melted cheese and any meat of your choosing in addition to your choice of additional ingredients!

foods.name: Taco
foods.description: The Flatburger exclusive Taco! Get it while supplies last!

foods.name: Hot Dog
foods.description: The Flatburger exclusive Hot Dog! Get it while supplies last!

foods.name: Onion Rings
foods.description: The Flatburger exclusive Onion Rings! Get them while supplies last!
